The Open Group Base Specifications Issue 6
IEEE Std 1003.1, 2004 Edition
Copyright © 2001-2004 The IEEE and The Open Group

Participants

The Austin Group

This standard was prepared by the Austin Group, sponsored by the Portable Applications Standards Committee of the IEEE Computer Society, The Open Group, and ISO/IEC JTC 1/SC22/WG15.

The Austin Group

At the time of approval, the membership of the Austin Group was as follows:

Andrew Josey, Chair
Donald W. Cragun, Organizational Representative, IEEE PASC
Nicholas Stoughton, Organizational Representative, ISO/IEC JTC 1/SC22/WG15
Mark Brown, Organizational Representative, The Open Group
Cathy Hughes, Technical Editor
